tests.name: Start, Quit
tests.description: Starts the program then issues the exit command which should end the program

tests.name: Start, Print, Quit
tests.description: Starts the program, attempts a print command which should cause an error, then issues the exit command which should end the program

tests.name: Check for End of Input
tests.description: Checks that the main() loop detects EOF when scanning typed input and exits. When working interactively in a terminal, typing <Ctrl>-d will indicate end of input.

tests.name: Create a New Gradebook
tests.description: Start the program, create a new gradebook with the name "CSCI 2011" and then exit.

tests.name: Create New Gradebook and Print Class Name
tests.description: Starts the program, creates a new gradebook, issues a command to print out the name of the new gradebook, and exits.

tests.name: Print Empty Gradebook Scores
tests.description: Creates a new gradebook, then issues a command to print scores from the empty gradebook, then exits.

tests.name: Invalid Print
tests.description: Starts the program and requests to print out scores when there is no currently active gradebook

tests.name: Invalid Lookup
tests.description: Starts the program and attempts to look up a score when there is no currently active gradebook

tests.name: Invalid then Valid Print
tests.description: Requests to print out scores when there is no currently active gradebook. Then creates a new empty gradebook and prints out scores

tests.name: Score Lookups in Empty Gradebook
tests.description: Attempts to look up student scores in an empty gradebook. Should get a not found message for any lookup attempt.

tests.name: Invalid Add
tests.description: Attempts to add a new student score before there is any currently active gradebook

tests.name: Invalid Add Negative
tests.description: Attempts to add a negative score to the gradebook

tests.name: Add Single Score
tests.description: Creates a new gradebook and adds one student score to it

tests.name: Add Multiple Scores
tests.description: Creates a new gradebook and adds a small number of scores

tests.name: Add, Print Single Score
tests.description: Creates a new gradebook and adds one student score before printing it out

tests.name: Add, Print Multiple Scores
tests.description: Creates a new gradebook and adds a small number of scores before printing them in alphabetical order

tests.name: Add and Look Up Score
tests.description: Adds a single score to a new gradebook, then looks up this score

tests.name: Add and Look up Multiple Scores
tests.description: Adds a small number of scores to a new gradebook, then looks up each of the previously added scores

tests.name: Add and Look up Multiple Scores 2
tests.description: Adds a small number of scores to a new gradebook, then looks up both existent and nonexistent scores

tests.name: Clear Before Class Command
tests.description: Creates a new gradebook, then clears it, then attempts to print out class name

tests.name: Clear Before Print
tests.description: Creates a new gradebook, then clears it, then attempts to print out scores

tests.name: Clear Before Lookup
tests.description: Creates a new gradebook, then clears it, then attempts to look up a score

tests.name: Invalid Clear
tests.description: Creates a new gradebook, then clears it, then tries to run the clear command again

tests.name: Multiple Clears
tests.description: Runs the clear command several times in a row to check that all memory is properly freed

tests.name: Read From Nonexistent Text File
tests.description: Attempts to read a gradebook from a text file that does not exist

tests.name: Text File Persistence 1
tests.description: Creates a new gradebook with a small number of scores, writes the gradebook to a text file. Clears, then reads in that same file, which should recover original gradebook

tests.name: Invalid Read from Text File
tests.description: Attempts to read in a new gradebook from a text file while there is still a currently active gradebook

tests.name: Read From Nonexistent Binary File
tests.description: Attempts to read a gradebook from a binary file that does not exist

tests.name: Binary File Persistence 1
tests.description: Creates a new gradebook with a small number of scores, writes the gradebook to a binary file. Clears, then reads in that same file, which should recover original gradebook

tests.name: Invalid Read from Binary File
tests.description: Attempts to read a new gradebook from a binary file while there is still a currently active gradebook

tests.name: Text and Binary File Combination
tests.description: Creates a new gradebook, writes it to a text file, then clears and creates a second gradebook, writes it to a binary file. Checks that both gradebooks can be recovered from their files

tests.name: Read Large Gradebook from Text File
tests.description: Reads in data from a provided large text file

tests.name: Read Large Gradebook from Binary File
tests.description: Reads in data from a provided large binary file

tests.name: Read Two Large Files
tests.description: Reads in gradebook from a text file and prints contents, then clears it and does the same for a binary file.

tests.name: Write Large Gradebook to Text File
tests.description: Reads in a large gradebook from a binary file, then writes it to a text file. Reloads from the text file and prints contents.

tests.name: Write Large Gradebook to Binary File
tests.description: Reads in a large results log from text file, then writes the log to a binary file. Reloads from the binary file and prints contents.

tests.name: Text File Command Line Argument
tests.description: Read in a text file with the name specified from the command line

tests.name: Binary File Command Line Argument
tests.description: Read in a binary file with the name specified from the command line

tests.name: Unknown File Type Command Line Argument
tests.description: The program receives a file name that does not end in either ".txt" or ".bin", which should cause an error.
